mapper.update: update ct_merchant_room set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from ct_merchant_room where merchant_id=#{merchantId} and name=#{name} and type=#{type} and status!=9 order by id desc
select * from ct_merchant_room where merchant_id=#{merchantId} and status=#{status} order by id desc

select curps.id, curps.room_params_id, curp.content as roomContent, curps.room_id,
curps.room_name,
curps.type,
curps.merchant_id,
curps.state,
curps.status,
curps.remark,
curps.use_date,
curps.update_date,
curps.create_date,
curps.creator,
curps.updater,
cmr.name,
cmr.icon,
cmr.status as crstatus,
cmr.num_low,
cmr.num_high,
cm.name as Dname from ct_merchant_room_params_set curps left join ct_merchant_room cmr on cmr.id=curps.room_id left join ct_merchant cm on cm.id = curps.merchant_id left join ct_merchant_room_params curp on curp.id=curps.room_params_id where 1=1
and curps.merchant_id in
#{item}
and curps.status=#{status}
and curps.state = #{state}
and DATE_FORMAT(use_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
